name: Little Red Cap!
description:
Little Red Riding Hood - Interactive Book is a marvelous new adaptation of the most famous fairy tale by the Grimm Brothers. Based on the classical story and accompanied by classical music, it makes story time magical for kids of all ages!

• Marvelous illustration and animations - over 200 beautiful and fun interactive elements

• Puzzle game – enjoy putting together a wonderful interactive puzzle and watching the elements come to life

• Classical music – brilliant sound and splendid music to make the experience all the more educational and pleasant

• Read to your child – read the story to your child while they interact with beautiful illustrations

Overall, an endless source of fun and entertainment for the entire family!
